revised_title: Correcting Professor Gmelin's Mistake on Sphondylium Vulgare Hirsutum
tldr: In this letter, Philip Miller corrects Professor Gmelin's mistake regarding the Sphondylium Vulgare Hirsutum plant. Miller explains that Gmelin has mistaken the species and provides evidence for the distinction between the two types of plants. He also discusses the common mistakes in botany and how they arise from assuming that plants mentioned as common in one country are the same as those in their own country.
